Posts.EditableText: Sure. You are using a dot in the name of Mrs. Beaty, but a dot is also the seperator of commands in Quest. So "look at Mrs. Beaty" is automatically seperated into two command: "look at Mrs" what is working correctly in Quest and in the command "Beaty" which is not a correct command.
